items.name: ESRI JavaScript API
items.description: ESRI's ArcGIS API for JavaScript is a lightweight library for working with ArcGIS Online or ArcGIS Server services.

items.name: Leaflet
items.description: Leaflet, at only 33kb of JavaScript, provides a lightweight and mobile friendly mapping API.  It is open source and  can be extended with third party libraries.

items.name: Google Maps API
items.description: Google Maps API provides a familiar interface and mapping experience, while supporting great basemaps and imagery.

items.name: OpenLayers 3
items.description: OpenLayers supports a host of layer types, and has many out of the box features others are lacking.

items.name: Mapbox
items.description: Mapbox allows beautiful map creation and customization.

items.name: CartoDB
items.description: CartoDB allows you to create 'amazing' maps in the cloud, with a PostGIS Backend
